lead_paragraph: The state approved a yearlong needle-exchange program for a rural county at the center of an H.I.V. outbreak that spurred a new state law allowing such programs.

headline.print_headline: Midwest; Indiana: County to Try Needle Exchange
headline.main: Indiana: County to Try Needle Exchange

snippet: The state approved a yearlong needle-exchange program for a rural county at the center of an H.I.V. outbreak that spurred a new state law allowing such programs.
abstract: Indiana approves needle exchange program through May 24, 2016 for Scott County, which is at center of largest HIV outbreak in state's history; county has been operating a temporary needle exchange under Gov Mike Pence's executive order.
